name: Hungry Hoodlum
overview: Hungry Hoodlum is a shooter that also has some resemblance to Pac-Man. The main difference is instead of collecting the various items around the screen, you have to destroy them. There are also enemies that you can destroy and who can also shoot back and kill you. The game has 8 levels in total. It was developed by Mr-Soft and published in Compute mit 1987/07. The main character of this game is a kind of ROBO droid that has to destroy all 42 energy crystals in a labyrinth. He is hindered by 5 monsters or droids. The crystals are destroyed by targeted shots. The monsters can also be shot down. Each crystal gives you 100 times level points. 200 times the level for each monster, and for each completed level you get 10,000 times the level points. If you are rammed or shot down by a monster, you lose one of your 5 lives.
